app.title: Kling AI: AI Image&Video Maker
app.description:
Kling AI is a next-generation AI creative studio, highly praised by creators worldwide. Powered by Kling large model and Kolors large model, it enables video and image generation and editing. Here, you can unleash your imagination, or get inspired from fellow creators to bring your ideas to life.

Key features of Kling AI:
● AI video generation: Supports Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video generation. Simply input a text prompt or image, and watch your ideas come to life in high-quality video up to 1080P resolution. The video extension feature allows you to generate creative content up to 3 minutes long.
● AI image generation: Supports Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image generation. Generate creative images in various dimensions and styles from text prompts or reference images. You can also convert an image into a video effortlessly with a single click.
● Community: Browse works from other users for inspiration, and collaborate with well-known AI creators to spark new ideas.
● Clone & Try: Found your favorite image or video in the community? With a single click, you can clone the work and try out the amazing idea on your own.

Thank you for choosing Kling AI. For any inquiries or support, please contact us at: kling@kuaishou.com.

Key features of Kling AI:

● AI image generation: Supports Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image generation. Generate creative images in various dimensions and styles from text prompts or reference images. You can also convert an image into a video effortlessly with a single click.

app.summary: Kling AI is an image and video generation and editing studio powered by AI.

reviews.text: Kling AI is fantastic at creating video from text or existing imagery. The best, in my experience, by far. The app, itself, needs a little time to mature, as it gets slow in playing the videos once created. The solution to this is to just close out the app and restart, and they play just fine. Alternatively, you could always download the videos and watch in another app. I highly recommend both the app and the service, and am excited to see where the app goes.

The app is an absolute favourite of mine when it comes to AI. The video quality and results are amazing, and I just love Kling AI. However, when I’m trying to generate a video, it keeps saying that the free queue is busy and it suggests the premium plans. I keep waiting but the free queue is always busy, please fix it. Otherwise, it is an amazing app, probably one of the best AI generators out there. Thank you.

it was perfect before I subscribed to membership. once I subscribed, non of my prompts worked. I tweaked the same videos several times wasting my points, and the image to video did not move my images of change them to video. it did absolutely nothing. I added an extra $10 after paying for membership because I thought it was me. but no matter what I've done, nothing worked. in total I wasted $30 on this app. I will likey money back!

You guys were perfect. before I was just using the browser version and everything was perfect. since you forced everyone to use the app my clips have been awful. it's not animating the picture!!! it's creating it's own video using elements. it's an awful idea. Elements is not working right. not following prompts and wasting my money. fix it please!

LAME DEFECTIVE FRUSTRATING MON-FUNCTIONAL. I Made 4 videos, then it stopped working. it auto-forced Pro features at the very beginning. Tasteless. but then when you figure out what to click, and to choose the lower quality render choice, it works. but now it stops me for 20 credit renders with 71 credits in my bank. NETWORK ERROR MY A**. flushed cache, data, cell restart, reinstalled, same Bull. I contacted support they said it solves itself, but they did not help. and my wifi is full strength.

so far, the best AI image and video generator app I've ever used for the subscription cost! the value you get in, in-app credits for money spent is amazing, as well as the credit cost for the images and videos you're able to create! by far the best app subscription choice for AI generation content, in my opinion! thank you, Kling AI! one very impressed subscriber here! well done!

Can't use says que is busy, howcan it be a trial if I can't use it. Fix for better review. update: Video Quality is good, very good however some general issues, like poltergeist head turning, and sometimes difficultly following prompt. Otherwise will get it right. Some interface navigation can be a bit confusing, otherwise solid.

The generation was okay, but it's a money scam. The payment was charged incorrectly, and customer service only replied once that they do not offer refunds and to feel free to unsubscribe from future charges. I was offered a $6.99 standard monthly plan, but it charged me $10, which is the price of buying credits alone without any discount. I then found many similar billing issues on Reddit.

This should be the nail in their coffin. They lock you into a membership that auto withdraws. If you have credits but no membership, then you can't use the credits up. The free credits to get you hooked , give you good results, but once I committed to a membership the problems started. very long processing and no motion, despite telling it to add movement. If you report it, it neither gets addressed nor credited. It's a shame , because it did work well for a few pictures.

love it so much! The quality is good, and they give free monthly credits. However seeing some bad reviews for this app, I just use this for simple work, like to generate text to images for my stories, and I don't encounter any problem at all. Love the result if you can find your unique detailed prompts in making images with this app

app.developerLegalAddress: 1 Raffles Place #36-01 One Raffles Place, Singapore 048616
app.AIReview:
Kling AI: AI Image & Video Maker – A Detailed Review

Overview

Kling AI presents itself as a “next-generation AI creative studio,” aiming to democratize video and image creation through its powerful AI models. With over 3.4 million installs and a solid 4.33 rating, the app has garnered significant attention within the art & design category. The core functionality revolves around Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video generation, leveraging Kling’s large model and Kolors large model to translate user prompts into visually compelling content. This review delves into every aspect of Kling AI, assessing its capabilities, usability, and overall value proposition for creative individuals.

Key Features

Kling AI boasts a comprehensive suite of features centered around AI-powered image and video generation:

  • Text-to-Video Generation: Users can input textual prompts – ranging from simple descriptions to complex narratives – and the app will generate videos based on those instructions. The description highlights support for “high-quality video,” though specific resolution details aren’t immediately apparent within the free version.
  • Image-to-Video Generation: Similar to text-to-video, users can upload an image as a starting point and instruct the AI to animate it, create looping videos, or transform it into different styles.
  • AI Editing Tools: Beyond generation, Kling AI includes basic editing functionalities – although the extent of these is somewhat limited in the free tier (detailed below).
  • Style Presets & Kolors Model Integration: The app utilizes the “Kolors large model,” suggesting a focus on stylistic control and potentially advanced color grading capabilities. The presence of style presets offers users immediate access to various artistic aesthetics.
  • Community Inspiration Feed: Kling AI incorporates a feed showcasing creations from other users, designed to inspire new ideas and demonstrate the potential of the platform.

Strengths

Several elements contribute to Kling AI’s success:

  • Accessibility & Free Tier: The app is completely free to download and use, removing a significant barrier to entry for aspiring creators. This accessibility has undoubtedly fueled its impressive install numbers.
  • Ease of Use (Initial Generation): The core text-to-video generation process appears remarkably straightforward. Inputting a prompt and hitting “generate” yields results relatively quickly – crucial for iterative experimentation.
  • Inspiring Community Feed: The community feed is genuinely valuable. Seeing the diverse range of videos and images generated by other users sparks creativity and provides concrete examples of what’s possible with Kling AI. It's a powerful motivator to continue using the app.
  • Potentially Powerful Models: The mention of "Kling large model" and "Kolors large model" suggests sophisticated underlying technology, hinting at future improvements and advanced features as the app evolves.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Kling AI faces several areas requiring attention:

  • Limited Free Tier Functionality: The free version severely restricts video length and resolution. Generating even short videos often results in lower quality output. This limitation feels overly restrictive given the app's ambition.
  • Editing Tool Weakness: The described “basic editing functionalities” are underwhelming. There’s no clear indication of what tools are available beyond perhaps trimming or simple color adjustments, especially considering the AI-driven generation capabilities. More robust editing would significantly enhance value.
  • Prompt Sensitivity & Consistency: User feedback (evident in reviews) suggests that prompt interpretation can be inconsistent. Achieving desired results often requires significant tweaking and experimentation with phrasing – a frustrating process for casual users.
  • Lack of Control Over Fine Details: Users appear to have limited control over granular aspects like frame rate, aspect ratio, or specific visual effects during generation. Greater customization options are needed.
  • Performance on Lower-End Devices: With 3.4 million installs, it's likely that some users are experiencing performance issues, particularly on older smartphones and tablets. Optimization is crucial.

User Experience

The user interface (UI) of Kling AI is generally clean and intuitive. The navigation is straightforward, with a prominent “Generate” button for video creation and clear sections for the community feed and settings. However, the onboarding process could be improved. New users might benefit from a more interactive tutorial that demonstrates the prompt engineering techniques necessary to achieve optimal results. The app’s responsiveness can occasionally feel sluggish, especially during complex generation tasks.

Value for Money

Currently, Kling AI offers significant value due to its free availability. However, the limitations of the free tier – particularly regarding video length and resolution – ultimately diminish its long-term value. The paid subscription model (details not explicitly outlined in the app description) will likely unlock expanded features and higher quality output, representing a crucial step for sustained adoption. A tiered pricing structure could cater to different user needs and budgets.

Conclusion

Kling AI represents an exciting foray into accessible AI creative tools. Its impressive install numbers demonstrate strong initial appeal, driven largely by its free access and inspiring community. The core text-to-video generation functionality is genuinely effective, offering a surprisingly quick path to visual content creation. However, the app’s success hinges on addressing its current limitations – primarily the restrictive free tier and inconsistent prompt interpretation – as well as expanding its editing tools and optimizing performance. If these issues are resolved, Kling AI has the potential to become a truly transformative tool for creators of all skill levels. As it stands, it's a promising experiment with significant room for growth and refinement.
